persistentId.name: Persistent Identifier
persistentId.description: The Dataset's unique persistent identifier, either a DOI or Handle

alternativePersistentId.name: Previous Dataset Persistent ID
alternativePersistentId.description: A previously used persistent identifier for the Dataset, either a DOI or Handle

publicationDate.name: Publication Date
publicationDate.description: The publication date of a Dataset.

citationDate.name: Citation Date
citationDate.description: The citation date of a dataset, determined by the longest embargo on any file in version 1.0.

title.name: Title
title.description: The main title of the Dataset

subtitle.name: Subtitle
subtitle.description: A secondary title that amplifies or states certain limitations on the main title

alternativeTitle.name: Alternative Title
alternativeTitle.description: Either 1) a title commonly used to refer to the Dataset or 2) an abbreviation of the main title

alternativeURL.name: Alternative URL
alternativeURL.description: Another URL where one can view or access the data in the Dataset, e.g. a project or personal webpage

otherId.name: Other Identifier
otherId.description: Another unique identifier for the Dataset (e.g. producer's or another repository's identifier)

otherIdAgency.name: Agency
otherIdAgency.description: The name of the agency that generated the other identifier

otherIdValue.name: Identifier
otherIdValue.description: Another identifier uniquely identifies the Dataset

author.name: Author
author.description: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that created the Dataset

authorName.name: Name
authorName.description: The name of the author, such as the person's name or the name of an organization

authorAffiliation.name: Affiliation
authorAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the author, e.g. an organization's name

authorIdentifierScheme.name: Identifier Type
authorIdentifierScheme.description: The type of identifier that uniquely identifies the author (e.g. ORCID, ISNI)

authorIdentifier.name: Identifier
authorIdentifier.description: Uniquely identifies the author when paired with an identifier type

datasetContact.name: Point of Contact
datasetContact.description: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that users of the Dataset can contact with questions

datasetContactName.name: Name
datasetContactName.description: The name of the point of contact, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

datasetContactAffiliation.name: Affiliation
datasetContactAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the point of contact, e.g. an organization's name

datasetContactEmail.name: E-mail
datasetContactEmail.description: The point of contact's email address

dsDescription.name: Description
dsDescription.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset

dsDescriptionValue.name: Text
dsDescriptionValue.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset

dsDescriptionDate.name: Date
dsDescriptionDate.description: The date when the description was added to the Dataset. If the Dataset contains more than one description, e.g. the data producer supplied one description and the data repository supplied another, this date is used to distinguish between the descriptions

subject.name: Subject
subject.description: The area of study relevant to the Dataset

keyword.name: Keyword
keyword.description: A key term that describes an important aspect of the Dataset and information about any controlled vocabulary used

keywordValue.name: Term
keywordValue.description: A key term that describes important aspects of the Dataset

keywordVocabulary.name: Controlled Vocabulary Name
keywordVocabulary.description: The controlled vocabulary used for the keyword term (e.g. LCSH, MeSH)

keywordVocabularyURI.name: Controlled Vocabulary URL
keywordVocabularyURI.description: The URL where one can access information about the term's controlled vocabulary

topicClassification.name: Topic Classification
topicClassification.description: Indicates a broad, important topic or subject that the Dataset covers and information about any controlled vocabulary used

topicClassVocab.name: Controlled Vocabulary Name
topicClassVocab.description: The controlled vocabulary used for the keyword term (e.g. LCSH, MeSH)

topicClassVocabURI.name: Controlled Vocabulary URL
topicClassVocabURI.description: The URL where one can access information about the term's controlled vocabulary

publication.name: Related Publication
publication.description: The article or report that uses the data in the Dataset. The full list of related publications will be displayed on the metadata tab

publicationCitation.name: Citation
publicationCitation.description: The full bibliographic citation for the related publication

publicationIDType.name: Identifier Type
publicationIDType.description: The type of identifier that uniquely identifies a related publication

publicationIDNumber.name: Identifier
publicationIDNumber.description: The identifier for a related publication

publicationURL.name: URL
publicationURL.description: The URL form of the identifier entered in the Identifier field, e.g. the DOI URL if a DOI was entered in the Identifier field. Used to display what was entered in the ID Type and ID Number fields as a link. If what was entered in the Identifier field has no URL form, the URL of the publication webpage is used, e.g. a journal article webpage

language.name: Language
language.description: A language that the Dataset's files is written in

producer.name: Producer
producer.description: The entity, such a person or organization, managing the finances or other administrative processes involved in the creation of the Dataset

producerName.name: Name
producerName.description: The name of the entity, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

producerAffiliation.name: Affiliation
producerAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the producer, e.g. an organization's name

producerAbbreviation.name: Abbreviated Name
producerAbbreviation.description: The producer's abbreviated name (e.g. IQSS, ICPSR)

producerURL.name: URL
producerURL.description: The URL of the producer's website

producerLogoURL.name: Logo URL
producerLogoURL.description: The URL of the producer's logo

productionDate.name: Production Date
productionDate.description: The date when the data were produced (not distributed, published, or archived)

productionPlace.name: Production Location
productionPlace.description: The location where the data and any related materials were produced or collected

contributor.name: Contributor
contributor.description: The entity, such as a person or organization, responsible for collecting, managing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the Dataset

contributorType.name: Type
contributorType.description: Indicates the type of contribution made to the dataset

contributorName.name: Name
contributorName.description: The name of the contributor, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

grantNumber.name: Funding Information
grantNumber.description: Information about the Dataset's financial support

grantNumberAgency.name: Agency
grantNumberAgency.description: The agency that provided financial support for the Dataset

grantNumberValue.name: Identifier
grantNumberValue.description: The grant identifier or contract identifier of the agency that provided financial support for the Dataset

distributor.name: Distributor
distributor.description: The entity, such as a person or organization, designated to generate copies of the Dataset, including any editions or revisions

distributorName.name: Name
distributorName.description: The name of the entity, e.g. the person's name or the name of an organization

distributorAffiliation.name: Affiliation
distributorAffiliation.description: The name of the entity affiliated with the distributor, e.g. an organization's name

distributorAbbreviation.name: Abbreviated Name
distributorAbbreviation.description: The distributor's abbreviated name (e.g. IQSS, ICPSR)

distributorURL.name: URL
distributorURL.description: The URL of the distributor's webpage

distributorLogoURL.name: Logo URL
distributorLogoURL.description: The URL of the distributor's logo image, used to show the image on the Dataset's page

distributionDate.name: Distribution Date
distributionDate.description: The date when the Dataset was made available for distribution/presentation

depositor.name: Depositor
depositor.description: The entity, such as a person or organization, that deposited the Dataset in the repository

dateOfDeposit.name: Deposit Date
dateOfDeposit.description: The date when the Dataset was deposited into the repository

timePeriodCovered.name: Time Period
timePeriodCovered.description: The time period that the data refer to. Also known as span. This is the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding, collecting data, or making documents machine-readable

timePeriodCoveredStart.name: Start Date
timePeriodCoveredStart.description: The start date of the time period that the data refer to

timePeriodCoveredEnd.name: End Date
timePeriodCoveredEnd.description: The end date of the time period that the data refer to

dateOfCollection.name: Date of Collection
dateOfCollection.description: The dates when the data were collected or generated

dateOfCollectionStart.name: Start Date
dateOfCollectionStart.description: The date when the data collection started

dateOfCollectionEnd.name: End Date
dateOfCollectionEnd.description: The date when the data collection ended

kindOfData.name: Data Type
kindOfData.description: The type of data included in the files (e.g. survey data, clinical data, or machine-readable text)

series.name: Series
series.description: Information about the dataset series to which the Dataset belong

seriesName.name: Name
seriesName.description: The name of the dataset series

seriesInformation.name: Information
seriesInformation.description: Can include 1) a history of the series and 2) a summary of features that apply to the series

software.name: Software
software.description: Information about the software used to generate the Dataset

softwareName.name: Name
softwareName.description: The name of software used to generate the Dataset

softwareVersion.name: Version
softwareVersion.description: The version of the software used to generate the Dataset, e.g. 4.11

relatedMaterial.name: Related Material
relatedMaterial.description: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about the material related to the Dataset, such as appendices or sampling information available outside of the Dataset

relatedDatasets.name: Related Dataset
relatedDatasets.description: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about a related dataset, such as previous research on the Dataset's subject

otherReferences.name: Other Reference
otherReferences.description: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about another type of resource that provides background or supporting material to the Dataset

dataSources.name: Data Source
dataSources.description: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about sources of the Dataset (e.g. a book, article, serial, or machine-readable data file)

originOfSources.name: Origin of Historical Sources
originOfSources.description: For historical sources, the origin and any rules followed in establishing them as sources

accessToSources.name: Documentation and Access to Sources
accessToSources.description: 1) Methods or procedures for accessing data sources and 2) any special permissions needed for access
